article.title: BAE Awarded Pulsed Power Research and Development Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems, Land and Armaments Division, Minneapolis, Minnesota, is being awarded an $11,658,980 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for research and development activities associated with Integrated Power Systems power load modules design whose applications include pulsed power loads for future surface combatants.Â The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
